sourcesContent:
import React from 'react' const Solutions = () => { return (

Solutions

Fraud detection

Amruta XAI helps to complete data analysis within milliseconds and detects complex patterns in the most efficient way which is difficult for the fraud analyst to detect. It also removes the time-consuming tasks and enables the fraud analysts to focus on critical cases.

Credit risk analysis

Credit Risk tool is used for granting, managing, and collecting different types of consumer and commercial loans. The tool is integrated with the application, underwriting, account management and recoveries decision engines.

Financial crimes & compliance

It can help find in consistent customer transactions and suspicious transactions. AI can detect relationships that are too complex to be understood by rule-based monitoring or the human eye.

Digital marketing

XAI feeds digital marketing and spread brand awareness by helping in content writing, link building, PPC campaigns, SEO, content management, chatbots.

) } export default Solutions
